author: volkov.rodion@gmail.com
msg: Added 1-minute timeout for avoiding infinite script execution in GenerateSWF, as well as issue 801 fix - pdf files are processed much better since pdf2swf output stream is read as well as error stream, thanks to daveWs156 for the information on the subject

author: seba.wagner
msg: This enhances the documents loading and whiteboard handling of documents to have better control over the document and the slides.
Some things to be fixed and a new problem:
- Non Moderators can scroll and this will be broadcasted to all people.
Also Non Moderators should not be allowed to load a document

author: seba.wagner
msg: Fixes Issue 493: Email verification is not implemented Was:Email verification wrong

=> now the config value sendEmailWithVerification is really handled and if its set to 1 there is an Email send, that contains a Link that is needed to click to activate the User-Account + Labels and Error values

author: seba.wagner
msg: Add Needed value to implement verification link
